## EntityManager.getEntitiesWithComponent() method

获取包含指定组件的所有实体

遍历所有实体，查找包含指定组件类型的实体。

**Signature:**

```text
getEntitiesWithComponent<T extends Component>(componentType: ComponentType<T>): Entity[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

componentType


</td><td>

ComponentType&lt;T\>


</td><td>

组件类型


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Entity](./ecs-framework-monorepo.entity.md)<!-- -->\[\]

包含指定组件的实体数组

## Example


```text
const entitiesWithHealth = entityManager.getEntitiesWithComponent(HealthComponent);
```
